name: Mutated Sea
description:
APP STORE (iPhone & iPad)

GAME JOLT (Browser & PC)


Mutated Sea is a violent fast paced action arcade game that takes place on the sea full of hungry sharks and mutant fishes.

Play as a greedy fisherman on the hunt for catching a newly discovered fish. Only later he found out about that these fishes are bloodthirsty mutants.


Can you get all the 6 medals?


FEATURES

  • Loads of blood, gibs and gore.
  • Fast paced action and madness.
  • 6 medals to collect as extra challenge.
  • Sharks on steroids.


REQUIRES

  • Quick reflexes.
  • Nerves of steel.
  • Love challenges.

(c)2014-2015, Splumsy
